Tommy Sheridan asked him about a House of Commons committee report which stated that the NoW "turned a blind eye" and "at worst actively condoned" bugging and hacking in the newsroom. Andy Coulson replied: I don't accept there was a culture of phone hacking at the NoW. There was a very unfortunate, to put it mildly, case involving Clive Goodman . No one was more sorry about it than me; that's why I resigned. Tommy Sheridan asked whether he know what the phrase "the dark arts" meant. The Sky Sports duo of anchor Richard Keys and match analyst Andy Coulson Gray are out of touch with the modern game according to a report in the Daily Mirror following their temporary suspension yesterday.
